hints.label: thm-yang-mills-final
hints.title: Emergent Yang-Mills Theory (FINAL)
hints.content:
3020: :label: thm-yang-mills-final
3021: 
3022: The Adaptive Gas generates a **Yang-Mills theory** with gauge group $G = SU(2)$ in the continuum limit.
3023: 
3024: **Gauge field**:
3025: 
3026: $$
3027: A_\mu = -\frac{1}{e} J_\mu^{\text{Noether}}
3028: $$
3029: 
3030: where $J_\mu^{\text{Noether}}$ is the Noether current from walker permutation symmetry $S_N \to SU(2)$.
3031: 
3032: **Field strength**:
3033: 
3034: $$
3035: F_{\mu\nu} = \partial_\mu A_\nu - \partial_\nu A_\mu + e [A_\mu, A_\nu]
3036: $$
3037: 
3038: **Yang-Mills action**:
3039: 
3040: $$
3041: S_{\text{YM}} = -\frac{1}{4} \int d^4 x \, \text{Tr}(F_{\mu\nu} F^{\mu\nu})
3042: $$
hints.raw_directive:
3017: From §7-9 (already complete):
3018: 
3019: :::{prf:theorem} Emergent Yang-Mills Theory (FINAL)
3020: :label: thm-yang-mills-final
3021: 
3022: The Adaptive Gas generates a **Yang-Mills theory** with gauge group $G = SU(2)$ in the continuum limit.
3023: 
3024: **Gauge field**:
3025: 
3026: $$
3027: A_\mu = -\frac{1}{e} J_\mu^{\text{Noether}}
3028: $$
3029: 
3030: where $J_\mu^{\text{Noether}}$ is the Noether current from walker permutation symmetry $S_N \to SU(2)$.
3031: 
3032: **Field strength**:
3033: 
3034: $$
3035: F_{\mu\nu} = \partial_\mu A_\nu - \partial_\nu A_\mu + e [A_\mu, A_\nu]
3036: $$
3037: 
3038: **Yang-Mills action**:
3039: 
3040: $$
3041: S_{\text{YM}} = -\frac{1}{4} \int d^4 x \, \text{Tr}(F_{\mu\nu} F^{\mu\nu})
3042: $$
3043:
